securepoll-blocked-partial: Gaafara, a ku tooi niŋ piibu piibu maa di yi lee ka bɛ bi ti a soli zaasa malisabi palo.
securepoll-tally-form-file-help: A  yi bahi satarili din kpari
securepoll-tally-job-enqueued: Piibu piibu maa nyɛla bɛ ni labiri maani shɛli laasabu pumpoŋɔ. A ni tooi labi bɔhi di ni nyɛ shɛm sahashɛli.
securepoll-votereligibility-label-not_bl: Di bi tu ni di kpari yaɣili ka che din kpalim.
